Text:
Is this real 1280x720 or is it
a upscaled DVD to MKV?
This is real, check the sample pictures to check the quality.

Why 50 frames?
Can't convert this to BluRay

Blu-ray players can display 720p @ 50fps just fine: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blu-ray_Disc#Media_format

Make sure your converter isn't trying to upscale to 1080p.
